title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen (CAMRIP)
alternative_title: Demon Slayer Movie: Infinity Train, 劇場版 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編
description: Tanjirou Kamado and his friends from the Demon Slayer Corps accompany Kyoujurou Rengoku, the Flame Hashira, to investigate a mysterious series of disappearances occurring inside a train. Little do they know that Enmu, one of the Twelve Kizuki, is also on board and has prepared a trap for them.
